p.codeblock: public abstract int setLocalVoiceReverb(Constants.AUDIO_REVERB_TYPE reverbKey, int value);
virtual int setLocalVoiceReverb(AUDIO_REVERB_TYPE reverbKey, int value) = 0;
public abstract int SetLocalVoiceReverb(AUDIO_REVERB_TYPE reverbKey, int value);
Future<void> setLocalVoiceReverb( {required AudioReverbType reverbKey, required int value});

section.p: The SDK also provides the method, which allows you to directly implement preset reverb effects for such as pop, R&B, and KTV.
section.note: You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.

pt.props: android cpp unity flutter rn electron

plentry.pd: The reverberation key. Agora provides five reverberation keys; see for details.
The value of the reverberation key.
